attributes.action: Help tp change the 1% pay increase to NHS workers.
attributes.additional_details: Throughout 2020 and to date the NHS staff have been on the frontlines everyday trying to keep people alive, pushing themselves to breaking point and putting their own families at risk or to avoid that risk finding separate accommodation. They have seen death after death and tried valiantly to keep those in the worst conditions alive. Frankly put they put their lives on the line for us so a 1% increase is an insult to them all. Clapping just isn't enough. Do the right thing Boris!
attributes.background: The Government needs to increase the pay rise for all NHS workers, they after all put their lives at risk to save ours.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
